posts.title: Double Beer Bong Bottle Funnel
posts.content: Set a new personal best for getting hammered in the shortest amount of time possible by downing your brewskies with this double beer bong bottle funnel. You simply place two glass bottles into the ports, flip them upside down, and chug like there’s no tomorrow.

posts.title: Giant Connect Four Game
posts.content: Make family game night something to look forward to with the giant Connect Four game. This four foot version multiplies the fun of this classic game and is made out of durable plastic, ideal for placing in the backyard or taking to the park.

posts.title: Silicone Bottle Caps
posts.content: Keep your open brew from going stale before you’re done drinking it by using one of these silicone bottle caps. These brightly colored flexible silicone caps are designed to fit most standard beer bottles and come in sets of six – a must-have for serious beer drinker.

posts.title: Pet Hair Paint
posts.content: Transform your furry friend into a four legged work of art using this pet hair paint. The paint is made from non-toxic materials that won’t harm your pet or their luxurious coat and is designed to work on all types of hair/fur.

posts.title: Inflatable Solar Lantern
posts.content: No electrical outlet in sight and you’re out of batteries? It’ll be no problem when you’ve got the inflatable solar lantern! This inflatable and waterproof lantern can remain lit for up to 12 hours – making it ideal for camping trips or in emergency situations.

posts.title: Canine Anxiety Relief System
posts.content: Keep your canine companion from freaking out during stressful situations by using this canine anxiety relief system. The harness fits comfortably over the torso to deliver acoustic and vibration therapy designed to relax your stressed out pooch.

posts.title: Joking Hazard Card Game
posts.content: Secure your one-way ticket to Hell by playing the Joking Hazard card game. Inspired by the Cyanide & Happiness webcomic, you and your demented friends compete to build funny and totally inappropriate comics about friendship, sex, and everything in between.

posts.title: Dual Camera Holster
posts.content: Strap up for wedding season with the dual camera holster and get two times the photography done. This stylish chestnut colored harness is worn in an “X” pattern across the back and leaves both cameras at hip length so you can easily switch between cameras.

posts.title: Two Stage Pro Knife Sharpener
posts.content: Keep every knife in your collection razor sharp with the two stage pro knife sharpener. The sharpener is ergonomically designed to provide a comfortable and natural grip in addition to providing two stages of sharpening – fine and coarse.

posts.title: Mepra Casablanca Oro Cutlery
posts.content: Class up your dining room by replacing your old utensils with this Mepra Casablanca Oro cutlery set. Each piece of this exquisite cutlery is accented with an elegant design and made from coated titanium which is four times stronger than steel.

posts.title: Toilet Illuminating Strips
posts.content: Never miss your mark in the middle of the night with these toilet illuminating strips. These clever strips glow in the dark so your late night trips to the toilet don’t end in a nasty mess thanks to your poor aim and bad vision. You’re welcome, men.

posts.title: iPhone Gaming Controller
posts.content: Take your favorite games on the go with the iPhone gaming controller. This cool add-on transforms your iPhone into a mobile gaming console that’ll provide hours of entertainment. The controller comes equipped with everything you need to enjoy precision mobile gaming.
